content: whip up these quick and cozy slippers then personalize them with fun optional pompoms stitched in toasty bernat softee chunky yarn you ll do half_double_crochet single_crochet chain stitch slip_stitch pompom increases and working in the round techniques a perfect gift idea around the holidays the pattern is offered in small medium and large sizes materials super bulky 6 bernat® softee chunky™ 3 5 oz/100 g 108 yds/99 m sizes 5/6 7/8 9/10 contrast a hot pink 28416 or gray ragg 28047 1 1 1 ball optional pompom contrast b brass 28807 1 ball or 46 yds/42 m sizes to fit adult s shoe size 5/6 7/8-9/10 finished foot length 9 9½-10½ 23 24-26 5 cm
